item.title: Nina Brodskaya – January Storm
item.description: Not easy (нелегко), not easy to love on this planet (нелегко полюбить на ней). Passing Each Other By January’s snowstorm rings (звенит январская вьюга) and the rain lashes down hard (и ливни хлещут упруго). Stars race in circles (звёзды мчатся по кругу) and the city noise (шумят города).

item.title: Muslim Magomajev and Big Children's Choir – New Day
item.description: Blue and Red Lyrics (see here) by Nikolai Dobronravov (= Николай Добронравов, 1928). Music by Aleksandra Pakhmutova (= Александра Пахмутова, 1929). Also see Наша Родина – революция (rline.tv, 2017). Новый день берёт своё начало, The new day takes its start На бескрайних улицах Москвы.

item.title: Polina Agureeva (Полина Агуреева) and Poetry
item.description: Мне тебя уже не надо (I Don’t Need You Anymore) Music by Mikael Tariverdiev (= Микаэл Таривердиев, 1931–1996). The text is a poem (1918) by Marina Tsvetaeva (= Марина Цветаева, 1892–1941). The text is here, a recitation here. Many versions exist online.

item.title: Mark Bernes – Dark Is the Night (Тёмная ночь)
item.description: Lyrics and explanation The song has its own page on Wikipedia. See Dark Is the Night (Soviet song) and the Russian version. Check Soundtimes.ru for a brief history and interesting facts. Definitely watch Songs from the film “Two Soldiers” performed by Mark Bernes (Первая Столица, 2015, 9 m).

item.title: Oleg Gazmanov – Forward Russia (Вперёд, Россия!)
item.description: Hackers According to the description of Вперёд, Россия! (Forward Russia), the clip о Величии России, about the greatness of Russia, was removed by hackers. Gazmanov’s website was also hacked. Значит, он кого-то настолько сильно задел, meaning it must have hit someone hard.

item.title: Nadezhda Kadysheva – Wide River
item.description: Sleeper Широка река, глубока река – the river is wide and deep. Не доплыть тебе с того бережка – you can’t swim from that shore. Flying won’t work either. She would do it (Полететь бы мне), but alas, there are no wings (да вот крыльев нет).

item.title: Alone on the Road (Выхожу один я на дорогу)
item.description: Poem and Text The text of Выхожу один я на дорогу can be found on retroportal.ru. You can also find the text with translations on Lyricstranslate – including Dutch translations, in four versions. For an analysis of the poem, watch the video below.

item.title: Maya Kristalinskaya – Tenderness
item.description: Film Known, among other things, for this film scene (starting at 1:30 min), from Три тополя на Плющихе or Three Poplars in Plyushchikha (1967). Definitely watch these three minutes from that film, featuring music by La Kristalinskaya. Performances The song, written in 1965 by Александра Пахмутова (Aleksandra Pakhmutova), has been performed many times.
